snippet: At 33, the oldest first-team all-N.B.A. player by six years, Kobe Bryant has overcome injury and his own rash mistakes to become one of the Lakers’ greatest.
abstract: Kobe Bryant has overcome injury and his own rash mistakes to become one of the Los Angeles Lakers greatest; at 33 he is the oldest first-team all-NBA player by six years.
lead_paragraph: At 33, the oldest first-team all-N.B.A. player by six years, Kobe Bryant has overcome injury and his own rash mistakes to become one of the Lakers’ greatest.

headline.seo: Through Titles and Tangles, Lakers’ Bryant Remains Enigmatic
headline.main: Amid Highs and Lows, Bryant Stays Enigmatic
headline.print_headline: Amid Highs and Lows, Bryant Stays Enigmatic
